alert.note: Alert for Northwest Providence (Rhode Island) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Winter Storm Warning issued March 14 at 10:14AM EDT until March 15 at 8:00AM EDT by NWS Boston
info.description: ...WINTER STORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 8 AM EDT WEDNESDAY... * WHAT...Mixed precipitation changing to heavy wet snow. Total snow accumulations of 3 to 8 inches, but up to a foot in the higher elevations in Worcester county. * WHERE...Portions of northern Connecticut, central, eastern and northeastern Massachusetts and northern Rhode Island. * WHEN...Until 8 AM EDT Wednesday. * IMPACTS...Travel could be very difficult especially across the high terrain and during the afternoon commute. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Heavy wet snow and strong wind gusts may result in downed tree limbs and power outages.
info.instruction: If you must travel, keep an extra flashlight, food, and water in your vehicle in case of an emergency.
